detectors.description:
DailyAction.isInTerm(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#386-393) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- latestActionTime[_sender] == 0 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#387)

DailyAction.updateTerm(uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#369-371) should emit an event for: 
	- term = _term (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#370)

DailyAction.setValidater(address)._varidater (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#365) lacks a zero-check on :
		- validater = _varidater (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#366)

DailyAction.isInTerm(address) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#386-393) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- latestActionTime[_sender] == 0 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#387)
	- block.timestamp >= latestActionTime[_sender].add(term) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/EE6BD04C6164D7F0Fa1cb03277C855639D99A7F6_DailyAction.sol#389)
